dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: Lunar Lander is an MDP from the Gym collection where the agent controls the thrusters of a spacecraft to safely land at a specific location. The environment has increased stochasticity with a 10% probability of repeating the last executed action.
dcterms:title: Lunar Lander

dcterms:creator: V. Mnih
K. Kavukcuoglu
D. Silver
A. A. Rusu
J. Veness
M. G. Bellemare
A. Graves
M. Riedmiller
A. K. Fidjeland
G. Ostrovski
dcterms:description: Asterix is one of the Atari games in the Arcade Learning Environment (ALE) where DQN is known to overestimate the action-values. The environment includes sticky actions with a probability of repeating the last action.
dcterms:title: Asterix

dcterms:creator: K. Young
T. Tian
dcterms:description: MinAtar is a RL testbed with environments mimicking the dynamics of games from ALE, but with a simplified state representation. It implements sticky actions and difficulty ramping.
dcterms:title: MinAtar

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: The Arcade Learning Environment (ALE) serves as an evaluation platform for general agents, providing a suite of Atari games for reinforcement learning research.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment (ALE)
